## GenerateResponse.text() method

Concatenates all `text` parts present in the candidate's message with no delimiter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
text(index?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The candidate index from which to extract text, defaults to first candidate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

A string of all concatenated text parts.
